# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here's a function that meets the requirements:

```julia
function wrap_string(s::AbstractString; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(s, ' ')
    result = IOBuffer()

    for (i, word) in enumerate(words)
        if i > 1
            line_len = sum(length.(words[1:i-1])) + (i - 1)
            if line_len + length(word) > text_width
                println(result)
            else
                write(result, ' ')
            end
        end
        write(result, word)
    end
    println(result)
    return String(take!(result))
end
```

Example:

```julia
julia> wrap_string("This is a test string to check the wrapping functionality.")
This is a test
string to check
the wrapping
functionality.
```
